text: Yaad karo woh waqt jabke tum thodey thay, zameen mein tumko be-zoar samjha jata tha, tum darte rehte thay ke kahin log tumhein mita na dein. Phir Allah ne tumko jaye panaah muhaiyaa kardi, apni madad se tumhare haath mazboot kiye aur tumhein accha rizq pahunchaya, shayad ke tum shukar-guzar bano
